main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Denver, Colorado, between July 26, 1952, and August 12, 1956.
interesting points: Ground Radar detected a single object for 13 seconds during one observation., Two balloons were reported moving slowly in the sky, exhibiting unusual behavior., Mrs. Mary Mettiner and Mrs. Jessie West reported seeing a large, luminous, circular object with a flaming red center., The luminous object hovered briefly before moving at tremendous speed., Several other witnesses, including Air Force personnel, reported similar sightings.
sighted object: various unidentified flying objects, including a luminous circular object and balloons
